input.sentences: this was us early waiting at the church for the rest of the family .
eventually | i had to get changed into a suit | though .
the groomsmen were with me though .
so after that we were hungry and went to get some delicious food .
output.sentences: The three brothers were waiting for the rest of their family to show up.
Eventually everyone arrived after getting changed into their suits and evening dresses.
The groomsmen are enjoying the reception as they plan what to say for their toast.
Everyone enjoyed dancing at the reception and they danced into the wee hours.
The brothers along with most of the rest of the wedding party ended up at the Waffle House where they were so hungry they found the food to be delicious.
